```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(fasterize)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(raster)
library(here)
library(mapview)

map <- st_read("/home/shares/food-systems/Food_footprint/_raw_data/GADM36/gadm36.shp")
#mapview(map)

tmp <- filter(map, GID_0=="USA")

palm <- map[grep("Palmyra", map$NAME_1), ]
mapview(palm)
palm_buffer <- st_buffer(palm, 10)

# Albers Equal Area Conic
# Need a different equal area projection (this is North America centric)
palm_equal_area <- st_transform(palm, 5070)
mapview(palm_equal_area)
crs(palm_equal_area)

palm_buffer <- st_buffer(palm_equal_area, 3000)
mapview(palm_buffer)


tet <- map[grep("Teti", map$NAME_4), ]
mapview(tet)
palm_buffer <- st_buffer(palm, 10)
```
